author: mgrigorov
msg: Add a demo for HttpsMapper usage

author: veithen
msg: Reenabled variable substitution in README-docs.txt (but using regular Maven filtering instead of ant).

author: danielsh
msg: On the 'atomic-revprop' branch, merge r981280 through r982005 from trunk.

author: scheu
msg: Added a XMLStreamWriter filter that can be set on the OMOutputFormat to intercept the outbound write.
Added a XMLStreamWriterRemoveIllegalChars that is a derivation of the filter.
Added a test to ensure that illegal chars are removed from the outbound message when the filter is requested.
